name: falseskill
description: A literal implementation of the Glicko-2 rating system in TypeScript. Got it?
author: Daniel Wirtz <dcode@dcode.io>

scripts.make: npm run-script compile && npm run-script compress && npm test
scripts.compress: node node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs falseskill.js --compress --source-map falseskill.min.js.map --in-source-map falseskill.js.map -o falseskill.min.js
